channel.description: Recent content in Exhibition on Story:Web

item.title: Objects
item.description: Sensemaker Objects In the ‘What if?…’ exhibition at the Great North Museum: Hancock, we asked you to describe three objects in three words. This is how the Museum’s keepers describe them. How well do the keeper’s descriptions match your words? Object 1: The Whitburn Harpoon This harpoon was found on the shore at Whitburn. It was possibly washed up from the sea and is therefore, potentially, an object from Doggerland.
